definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: An explosion was also reported at a military base in the Tajura region east of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸还报告了在的黎波里以东塔朱拉地区的军事基地。

sentences.english: You cannot enter a military base without a permit.
sentences.chinese: 无通行证不得擅入军事基地。

sentences.english: It's also the road to the sprawling international military base at Bagram.
sentences.chinese: 该道路也通往巴格拉姆的国际军事基地。

sentences.english: He says environmental issues on military bases put stress on U.S.-South Korea relations.
sentences.chinese: 他说，军事基地的环境问题导致美韩关系紧张。

sentences.english: There used to be a military base in the region.
sentences.chinese: 在美国军事基地所设立的免税福利社。

sentences.english: On Friday several thousand pro-government supporters rallied outside an army base where Mr.
sentences.chinese: 周五，数千名亲政府派支持者在某军事基地外集会。

sentences.english: He also had a pirate base on the Island of Padre Island off of the coast of Texas.
sentences.chinese: 他在得克萨斯海岸附近的帕德瑞岛上有一处军事基地。

sentences.english: We seek no military bases there.
sentences.chinese: 我们不想在那里有军事基地。

sentences.english: Okinawans have been protesting against the bases for years.
sentences.chinese: 冲绳居民几年来一直都在抗议军事基地。

sentences.english: A group of baseball stars will tour overseas military bases.
sentences.chinese: 一个棒球明星团将要到海外军事基地作巡回表演。

sentences.english: We have closed or turned over to Iraq hundreds of bases.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经关闭或向伊拉克移交了数百个军事基地。

sentences.english: Previously, most U.S. troops had been sequestered in five huge military bases.
sentences.chinese: 之前，大多数美国军队驻扎在五个巨型军事基地。

sentences.english: He slept on an Army base.
The men were put on buses and taken to an army base in al-Baida.
sentences.chinese: 大家被安排上了公车，前往一个在艾贝达的军事基地。

sentences.english: Establishing military bases at all possible strategically important points on the globe.
sentences.chinese: 在全球的各个可能的战略要点都建立军事基地。

sentences.english: For China, the benefits of such bases are threefold.
sentences.chinese: 对中国来说，这样的军事基地有三点好处。

definition: stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
